Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extending the effectiveness of the occupancy tax in the town of North Castle
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of the occupancy tax in the town of North Castle to 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 506 of the laws of 2016, amending the tax law relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax in the town of North Castle, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
